gitlab.howToCreateToken: How to create a GitLab Personal Access Token:
gitlab.step1: Go to your GitLab profile ‚Üí Edit Profile ‚Üí Access Tokens
gitlab.step2: Enter a name and expiration date
gitlab.step3: Select the api scope for full API access
gitlab.step4: Click "Create personal access token" and copy it immediately
gitlab.tokenWarning: Note: The token will only be shown once. Store it securely.

jira.howToSetupOAuth: How to set up Jira OAuth 1.0a authentication:
jira.oauthWarning: Note: OAuth 1.0a is deprecated. Consider using OAuth 2.0 for new integrations.
jira.step1: Generate RSA key pair using OpenSSL:
jira.step2: In Jira: Settings ‚Üí Applications ‚Üí Application Links
jira.step3: Create incoming link with your consumer key and public key
jira.step4: Complete the OAuth flow to get your access token

plane.howToCreateToken: How to create a Plane Personal Access Token:
plane.step1: Log into your Plane account or instance
plane.step2: Go to Profile Settings ‚Üí Personal Access Tokens
plane.step4: Enter a name and copy the generated token immediately
plane.tokenWarning: Note: The token will only be shown once. Store it securely.

organisation.step1Desc: Vai alle impostazioni dell'organizzazione e crea una nuova organizzazione per invitare altri.
